name: Chamber.Repeat();
description:
Chamber.Repeat(); is a small 2D puzzle game where the level always changes. Just like Andy Warhol's "Campbell Soup's", some elements shift and change while you have to reach the finish over and over again, getting more difficult with more and more chamber elements.

Movement:

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Use
  • Q - Retry Chamber
  • ESC - Quit
  • Mouse to aim
  • LMB - Shoot energy bullet

Made by Laura Heimann for the Paint Jam 2021. All graphics (besides the games logo) were created in MSPaint and exported to Pyxel Edit to add transparency. The gamejam theme was "Campbell Soup (Andy Warhol)".
